TopicTitle: How do you pull the data off of the science lab?

Articles.Content: Just like the subject says, how do you pull the data out of a science lab? I don't see that option coming up when I right click on it. Thanks!

Just a guess but I think you may be confused with how the mobile processing lab works. When you perform an experiment, keep the data, and bring it to the MPL (or have the experiments attached to it) it will present you with a data value. The MPL has a data storage capacity of 500, meaning that you can transfer up to 500 data into the MPL for processing. You then must make sure it has at least one scientist on board and click "Start Research" to begin actually turning this "data" into science we can spend on tech. You'll notice that you're shown a "sci per day" number which will be higher the closer you are to the maxium 500 data load. The data will start to be consumed over time as the lab produces science. To then retrieve this science, you must have an antenna to transmit.
